CodeExample.Title: Call the Item/add action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the Item/add action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request:
POST /<version>/myOrganization/drives/<Drive.id>/files/add HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : <body_length>
{ path : <Edm.String>, nameConflict : <Edm.String>, type : <Edm.String>, content : <Edm.Stream> }

Remarks.string: A successful call to the Item/add action returns an instance of the Microsoft.Graph.Item type.
